trans-unit.source: Creates a user-selectable list of hierarchical data source names.
trans-unit.target: 建立可供使用者選取的階層式資料來源名稱清單。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter> class is a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> object that is typically referenced by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter>類別是<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>通常所參考的物件<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: All members except the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A> method are inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter>.
trans-unit.target: 所有成員，除非<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A>方法都繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A> method indicates whether the specified component implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A>方法會指出指定的元件是否實作<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource>介面。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter> class when the class is referenced by a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter>類別時所參考類別<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.
Gets a value indicating whether the specified component is a valid data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出指定的元件是否為有效資料來源。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="component" /> is a valid data source; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="component" /> 是有效資料來源則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A> method considers `component` a valid data source if it implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A>方法視為`component`如果它所實作的有效資料來源<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource>介面。
